bio: Are you looking for someone who bridges the gap between Front-End Development and UI/UX Design? That's where I come in. With over 4 years of front-end development experience and 2 years of expertise in UI/UX design, I’ve had the opportunity to lead impactful projects, such as the website redesign for SHARP Dance Company and the modernization of WP Creative Pets.

By combining technical skills like JavaScript, React, and HTML/CSS with a deep understanding of Figma and design thinking methodologies, I create digital experiences that are both functional and user-focused. My work at Mindera involved creating and maintaining a comprehensive component library, ensuring consistency and reusability across digital assets. I’m also skilled in usability testing, wireframing, and user interviews, ensuring that user needs are at the heart of every project I take on.

I’m passionate about solving complex problems, collaborating across teams, and delivering clean, efficient solutions that make an impact. If you're searching for a Front-End Developer or UX Designer who brings both technical know-how and design intuition to the table, let’s connect and explore how I can help your business grow.
Feel free to reach out if you're interested in discussing projects, collaborations, or exploring digital solutions together.

testimonials.text: Elrey has the rare combination of technical skill, strategic vision, and team orientation. I asked him and three others to take over the development of a complex application that generates an unlimited number of math problems of an unlimited variety of problem types based on whatever parameters a user inputs. It took just a matter of hours before he had internalized the project code and made a plan to make it considerably more efficient and easy to understand. He works seamlessly on his own and with others, is well-respected and appreciated by his colleagues, and carries and ethic and initiative that lets him bring elegant solutions to complex problems. I was sad to lose him, and whoever gets him next will be very, very lucky to have him.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
